questions.question: She .......................... not have a job.
questions.description: Have is followed by a past participle do and does are followed by bare infinitives.

questions.question: ............................. you heard from them yet?
questions.description: Have is followed by a past participle do and does are followed by bare infinitives.

questions.question: We ......................... not throw away anything useful.
questions.description: Have is followed by a past participle do and does are followed by bare infinitives.

questions.question: ............................ you know her?
questions.description: Have is followed by a past participle do and does are followed by bare infinitives.

questions.question: What ............................ you do then?
questions.description: Then indicates distance in space hence, did is used here.

questions.question: Where ............................. they live?
questions.description: Have is followed by a past participle do and does are followed by bare infinitives.

questions.question: Whom ................................ you want to meet?
questions.description: Have is followed by a past participle do and does are followed by bare infinitives.

questions.question: How ............................. they escape?
questions.description: Have is followed by a past participle do, does and did are followed by bare infinitives.

questions.question: ............................. they interested in this offer?
questions.description: Be (is, am, are, was, were) shows state have shows possession.

questions.question: ........................... I late?
questions.description: Am indicates state. Have indicates possession.
